document.docAuthor: Mikátová, Šárka, Macháčková, Lenka & Hájek, Jiří
document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of type specimens of beetles (Coleoptera) deposited in the National Museum, Prague, Czech Republic

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of type specimens of beetles (Coleoptera) deposited in the National Museum, Prague, Czech Republic

subSubSection.paragraph: Seven paratypes are deposited in NMPC (ex coll. L. Hromádka):

PA*©A*´YPൾඌ (1, 1 unsexed specimen): ‘I.R.S.A.C.-MUS. CONGO / Kundelungu 1750 m . [p] / 9-III [hw] -1950 / N. Leleup [p] / (Prairie herb.) [hw] // Récolté dans / nid de / Cryptomys [p, green label] // ex coll. L. Hromádka / National Museum / Prague, Czech Republic [p]
PA*©A*´YPൾඌ (2 unsexed specimens): ‘I.R.S.A.C.-MUS. CONGO / Kundelungu 1750 m . [p] / (Prairie herb.)9-III [hw] -1950 / N. Leleup [p] // Récolté dans / nid de / Cryptomys [p, green label] // ex coll.

L. Hromádka / National Museum / Prague , Czech Republic [p] // PARATYPUS /
PHILONTHUS (Philont.)
/ macronyx sp. nov. / Hromádka, det. 2008 [p, red label]’.

One paratype is deposited in NMPC (ex coll. L. Hromádka):

PA*©A*´YPൾ (): ‘ TANZANIA 970 m / Njia Panda, Mwanihana / Udzungwa Mountains N.P / S07°47ʹ27.7ʺ;E036°49ʹ33.7ʺ / 12-14.iv.11 Dung Pitfall Trap / leg.Smith,R & Takano,H [p] // BMNH{E} / 2011-88 [p] // ex coll. L. Hromádka / National Museum / Prague, Czech Republic [p] // PARATYPUS /
PHILONTHUS
(s. str.) / mandrillus (s. str.) / Hromádka, det., 2012. [p, orange label]’.

Philonthus hromadkai
Schülke, 2012 for
Philonthus

merops Hromádka, 2011, a junior primary homonym of
Philonthus nectarinia Hromádka, 2012
Philonthus ( Onychophilonthus ) merops Smetana, 1963
.
